home.title: Welcome
home.description: This is Amjad, a passionate software engineer who turns ideas into reality, fast. With deep expertise in JavaScript, Python, and .NET, combined with hands-on experience leveraging AI agents like Claude Code, Open Code, and n8n, he delivers reliable solutions at unprecedented speed. He quickly adapts to new tools and technologies, ensuring every project benefits from the latest innovations. Whether it's understanding complex business processes or building the software to support them, Amjad gets things done.

about.title: About
about.description1: Amjad is the CTO at Edama Solutions, where he leads the technical vision and builds software that helps organizations run their operations smoothly. Over the years, he has had the opportunity to work on impactful projects for major clients like Al Rajhi Bank and Geidea, delivering everything from internal tools to customer-facing applications.
about.description2: Beyond his day job, he has participated in programs like the Taqaddam Business Accelerator at KAUST, which sharpened his product thinking and business acumen. He enjoys wearing multiple hats, whether it's architecture, hands-on coding, or making product decisions that move the needle.

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

project1.title: Geidea Partner Portal
project1.description: A portal which allowed the sales team in Geidea to manage and track their partnerships effectively.

project2.title: Al Rajhi Bank Contact Center Dashboard
project2.description: A dashboard that provided real-time insights and analytics for the contact center operations of Al Rajhi Bank, allowing the team to catch issues and fix them instantly before reaching the end customer.

project3.title: Edama Tech
project3.description: An Internal Audit automation system which allows an organization to manage risks, compliance, and internal controls efficiently. It also allows auditors to plan, execute, and report on audits effectively in a near instant time.

tools.codingAgents: AI Agents: Claude Code, Open Code, n8n
tools.presentations: Presentations: PowerPoint, Google Slides, Gamma, Canva, HTML/CSS
tools.editors: Text Editors: Visual Studio Code, Zed

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You're welcome to reach out to me for collaboration, consulting, academic research, and software development.
contact.formCta: Have a project idea or question? Fill out the contact form and I'll respond within 24 hours.
